Introduction

Kwon Yuri is a South Korean singer-songwriter, dancer, and actress under SM Entertainment. She is best known as one of the main dancers and lead rappers of the girl group Girls' Generation. She is also a member of its sub-unit Girls' Generation-Oh!GG.

She debuted as a member of Girls' Generation on August 5, 2007, with the group's first single, "Into the New World." On September 5, 2018, Yuri debuted as a member of Girls' Generation's second sub-unit, Girls' Generation-Oh!GG with their first single, "Lil' Touch."

On October 4, 2018, Yuri made her solo debut with her first mini-album, "The First Scene."
